long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Zeon Helper (aka Zeon Chrome Kit) is a complimentary extension to help Zeon Downloader users, by allowing dragging images on sites that disable image drag, and allowing right clicking to show context menu on sites that disable that feature as well.
